Articles.Content:
Hi! It's me, ExplodingRocketShips! I like doing random stuff in KSP

(Ps, Could anyone tell me how to edit my avatar, It's stuck on "Do not use an avatar")
It looks like you didn't yet have 5 submitted posts when you tried your avatar change, but since you're over that limit now, it should work.
Well... I guess Vanamonde answered your question. Anyhow, if you need any help in KSP, feel free to PM me!
